name: .EWS File Extension
summary: Learn about .EWS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by EasyWorship, an application used for creating church worship schedules; contain the order of service as well as PowerPoint (.PPT or .PPTX) files, sample audio files, and song lyrics; used by worship leaders and pastors when preparing services.

content: EWS files allow multimedia data to be combined with the schedule into a single file, which makes it easy to consolidate service information together.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
